attributes.action: Under the unusual circumstances, I demand a general election as soon as possible
attributes.additional_details: With all parties in disarray,  and many sitting MPs on all sides of the spectrum having lost the confidence of their local electorate we presently have no  government with a real mandate  to carry on business and  set the policy and the actions for the major changes that may lie ahead.
attributes.background: It is bad enough for democracy if a prime minister is nominated simply on the say-so of just a few members of a particular party. Now it is particularly important that the Prime Minister has the support of a majority of the voting nation before irrevocable and irreversible  actions are taken.
